{{dcl header | experimental/simd}}

{{dcl | since=parallelism_ts_2 | num=1 |
template&lt; class T, class... Abis &gt;
simd&lt;T, simd_abi::deduce_t&lt;T, (simd_size_v&lt;T, Abis&gt; + ...)&gt;&gt;
concat( const simd&lt;T, Abis&gt;&amp;... vs ) noexcept;

{{dcl | since=parallelism_ts_2 | num=2 |
template&lt; class T, class... Abis &gt;
simd_mask&lt;T, simd_abi::deduce_t&lt;T, (simd_size_v&lt;T, Abis&gt; + ...)&gt;&gt;
concat( const simd_mask&lt;T, Abis&gt;&amp;... vs ) noexcept;
}}

{{dcl end}}

Concatenates the input {{rlpt|simd}} or {{rlpt|simd_mask}} objects.

===Parameter===

{{par begin}}
{{par | vs | the input {{rlpt|simd}} or {{rlpt|simd_mask}} parameter pack}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===

The concatenated result of a single {{rlpt|simd}} or {{rlpt|simd_mask}} object.
